text: Change case of first letter in every cell in spreadsheet
I have many cells which I'd like to convert such that the first letter in every cell is capitalized.
cook, chef, fireman becomes Cook, Chef, Fireman.

lis.text: I have the spreadsheet in OpenOffice.org, but it seems to only have options for "all uppercase" or "all lowercase".
I can edit it in OpenOffice.org or export to a CSV and edit the CSV with a BASH script, if OpenOffice.org cannot do this.

text: How can I change the first letter of every cell in the spreadsheet to uppercase?
